Packages 
Package Description
com.receiver2d.dependencies
Handles native library dependencies at runtime (liblwjgl.so, etc)
com.receiver2d.editor
The graphical component built on top of the Receiver2D engine.
com.receiver2d.editor.gui  
com.receiver2d.engine
General classes of the Receiver2D game engine exist here.
com.receiver2d.engine.entitysystem
Specific classes involving the management of game entities
com.receiver2d.engine.entitysystem.components
Specific components that augment entity behavior when attached
com.receiver2d.engine.geometry
This part of the engine accounts for entity morphology.
com.receiver2d.engine.graphics
This part of the engine provides the game's visual display, and consists of mostly GL calls.
com.receiver2d.engine.gui
This part of the engine contains support for developing interactive GUI elements of a game.
com.receiver2d.engine.io
The basic file I/O of Receiver2D
com.receiver2d.engine.tests
Test classes used to experiment with unstable features
